projects.ans: Our Data Science course program covers a wide range of essential data science topics from the introductory level to the advanced level. Our comprehensive course curriculum trains you in data science projects in Python, C/C++, Advanced Machine Learning, Deep Learning, Applied Statistics and around 20+ tools (including Excel , SQL databases, etc).

Full stack developers use modern development tools to create and deploy applications that are both functional and aesthetically pleasing. These tools include: HTML5 + CSS3, JavaScript + jQuery, ReactJs + Node.js
